document.text:
From: "Berman, Geoffrey (USANYS)"  
To:' 
Cc: ' 
Subject: Re: updates 
Date: Sat, 06 Jul 2019 22:28:04 +0000 
Importance: Normal 
I will continue to forward updates as I get them. 
It is really quite extraordinary that our team was able to conduct an investigation of great sensitivity and public 
interest with complicated witnesses over a period of several months, resulting in an excellent indictment, and 
manage to keep it all entirely covert. It has been an effort requiring enormous sophistication, judgment and 
dedication, which is a testament to you all. And the case is a righteous one. Thank you all. Geoff 
On Jul 6, 2019, at 5:54 PM, Berman, Geoffrey (USANYS)  > wrote: 
Epstein is in custody. Search warrants being 
executed now. Geoff 
On Jul 6, 2019, at 12:44 PM, Berman, Geoffrey (USANYS)  > wrote: 
ells me that he is confirmed on board. Wheels up. Geoff 
On Jul 
6, 2019, at 11:10 AM, 
Good morning all â€”
 l> wrote: 
M
asked me to pass along two quick updates. First, Judge Moses signed the search warrant this morning. 
Second, our case agent told us that FBI received a flight manifest from CBP last night. The passengers listed are 
Epstein and two pilots. Of course, that is subject to change, and I'm told that FBI will try to get confirmation of the 
passengers after the flight takes off. 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
EFTA00029514
